about_the_game:
ProtonVR is a VR Roguelite Retro Shooter.

A solo-developer dream game: Inspired by the 90s vision of futuristic battles, robots, lasers, and space, ProtonVR throws you into relentless action against ever-changing hordes of enemies. Face off against ruthless cyborg armies, bloodthirsty zombies, hyper-corporations, and terrifying aliens as you navigate through dynamic pocket universes. Customize your arsenal, and jump into the warp-gate aboard your trusty proton-class spaceship.

Key features include:

  • Retro Immersive VR Combat
  • Procedurally Generated 3D Pixel-Art Levels
  • Advanced Weapon Interaction Mechanics
  • Weapon Customization System
  • Weapon Repair and Upgrading
  • Endless Replayability
  • Roguelite Progression System

Prepare yourself for a challenging and retro pixel-art VR experience.

Own your playstyle.

Commando and unleash chaos, blasting everything in your path with unrestrained firepower.
Stealthy, silently taking out enemies before they even know what hit them.
Tactical approach, using precision and quick reactions to eliminate foes with professional efficiency.
Your game, your choice.

Befriend your weapons.

Familiarize yourself with your distinct weapons to truly unlock their potential during gameplay.
Weapons degrade and jam, so always keep your weapons repaired and add attachments and upgrade them to your liking.

Own your guns.

Make weapons your own, but remember: each weapon is distinct and unique, but it's up to you to make them so.

Attachments:

There is a vast amount of customization you can bring upon your weapon given the provided attachments. Remember that some will be from the realm of science-fiction. Not only that but most attachments have an effect on the weapons behaviour.

These include scopes, holographic sights, under-barrel attachments (grenade-launchers, fusion-guns), lasers, grips (recoil) , suppressors (detection), and much more for you to find out. Go nuts!

Repair Mini-Game

Keep your favourite weapons jam-free by finding a nearby workbench.

Ammo types

Each weapon can use several types of ammo unique to their type such as Armor-Piercing rounds, Dragons-Breath, Boron-Tipped Railgun shells, Lithium-Ion laser-gun batteries...

Armory Store

After playing and collecting Radions, you will be able to purchase Weapons, Grenades, Ammo, Attachments, Healing Kits...
That is, if you have them unlocked when certain requirements are met.

Procedurally Generated Levels

ProtonVR's levels are all procedurally generated given that it is a Roguelite game, and players will go into new adventures with each time they enter the warp-gate. Expect the unexpected.

Armory

Inside the home base-station, beside the warp-gate there is a huge Armory for players to store, customize and test their weapons.
Includes a Workbench to purchase items and repair your weapons, and a shooting range to test and probably ruin your weapons (hence the nearby workbench).

Roadmap

name: PROTON VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Meta Quest(s), HTC Vive,
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: ProtonVR is a VR Roguelite Retro Shooter dream-inspired by classic 90s shooters and movies. Customize your weapons arsenal, craft attachments, cybernetic upgrades and choose your playstyle. Fight commandos, cyborgs, robots, zombies and much more!
